root.name: Super Brain Eat 3
root.description: OverviewSuper Brain Eat 3 is a retro action puzzle game developed by TACS Games for PlayStation Mobile. Inspired by Pac-Man, it takes the concept in a more puzzle oriented direction, as the player must guide a hungry demon through a variety of levels, gobbling up all the hearts and brains strewn about while avoiding traps and roaming jelly monsters.
